column1: # Title: Item mapping for fish species between ISSCAAP and aggregated groups

# Description:  The mapping is available in FISHSTATJ but in a PDF. ISSCAAP_group is used for FAOSTAT FBS. ISSCAAP_star was included in the PDF and starred items were not included in certain aggregations.
